original_text:
as I was in my prime,
    when the friendship of God was upon my tent,
korean_text: 내가 원기 왕성하던 날과 같이 지내기를 원하노라 그 때에는 하나님이 내 장막에 기름을 발라 주셨도다

sentences.original_text: as I was in my prime
when the friendship of God was upon my tent
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 친밀하심이 내 장막에 임하였을 때에
